There are security officals here for protection. The St. Ambrose website offers jobs, and contact information for secutity purposes year round. Students also have acess to security via phone 24/7.
A wide variety of clubs and organizations geared towards helping students expand thier knowledge. Clubs also offer a great chance to build friendships as well.
All types of students from academic based to aspiring althlets.
Fall out shelters are located here! During the Cold War fallout shelters were built to protect against nuclear bombs! Historically Ambrose is unique and has many other unusual locations.
Students pay and get a bang for their buck. Staff is friendly and helpful to all students. there is an 11:1 student to faculty member ratio. Small classes and individual attention are a primacy here.
join clubs, sports, research activities and much more...
Great selection and meals are affordable.
currently live off campus.

Ambrose offers extensive academic rigor. They expect a lot out of their students, but respectfully understand that we demand professors and staff that help us reach our goals accordingly. Ambrose will help expand your knowledge and perception of the world around you.
Join this school simply put. This university offers you a helping hand showing you how to recieve help and how to help others. Apply as soon as possible and become a fighting bee.

St. Ambrose is the ideal school for any Student, and i consider it one of the top rated schools in Iowa. I have visited many schools but none of them even come equal to the majestic standards Ambrose holds. St. Ambrose University compels students to dream and achieve thier goals making them a top ranking school in my opinion.

TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {98037=St. Ambrose is a small, closely knit school full of great teachers. I went in as a freshman in 2012 with a certain list of pre reqs and they got a new head of the department my sophomore year and now the prereqs have changed so i wasted money and time on classes that I no longer need. textAfterTable: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus there are no real traditions on campus Bang for the buck st. ambrose is expensive, but when you graduate from here, you will be well prepared for your future career aspirations. ambrose also offers a ton of academic and athletic scholarships to help with the cost. What to do for fun there is a ton of things to do for fun on campus, but the student has to make the decision to get involved. there are: clubs, athletics, drama, intramurals, and tons of fun events that are put on by the university. Food and Dining the food at the cafeteria is good, but you have to find out how to make it work the best for you. they have many options each day and can even make special meals to accomodate dietary issues. Dorm Life the residence halls at st. ambrose are very nice, and can be very functional if the students take the time to organize their room. st. ambrose will go from traditional housing to preferred housing as they move through their years. as they move into preferred status, they will get more
